sub_title: Senior Manager of Consultants at Dassault Systemes DELMIA
summary:
In both my personal life and my career I have had the privilege to experience how much strength and energy one can obtain by setting goals and reaching them at some point in time. Therefore, I am keen to always aspire to new standards and aim to live up to them in the best possible way. My passion is to extrapolate this principle to others as well. To provide others with an eye-opening mindset, supporting them in reaching their goals and learning from other people’s views is what drives me. I find pure happiness in the ‘wow-moments’ in which expectations are exceeded.

In my career, I gain energy from combining my analytical capacities with my communicative skills. With my enthusiastic yet down-to-earth way of providing others with insight in complex matters, and by using my strong presentation skills to achieve this, I can add my unique value. 

I am interested in efficiency matters that involve an econometric background. Analyzing problems using mathematical and econometric theory in order to both create and explain new ideas, tools and solutions that make a difference within an organization is what fascinates me.

People describe me as dedicated, adventurous and social. My no-nonsense attitude creates an open setting in which people easily feel comfortable and respected in a natural way. My most important values in life are honesty, openness and devotion. I constantly seek to learn and develop myself in personal and intellectual fields. In many ways my view on life is that the sky is the limit!

profile_positions.description:
Established in 2021, the DELMIA WorldWide HUB consists of a pool of experts in the field of all the DELMIA Brand software products (Apriso, Ortems, Quintiq).
The HUB brings Dassault Systemes and its customers worldwide project quality and stability. Dassault's worldwide GEO-departments make use of the HUB resources & expertise to mitigate big fluctuations in utilization and to secure team quality and stability.

People Management responsibilities
* Managing a team of 8-10 people from different roles (Business Consultants / Software Consultants) based in Netherlands
* Setting, tracking and evaluating people's yearly goals & targets
* Supporting team members in HR-related manners
* Be a daily go-to person for team members; support them in any struggles they might experience in their projects or other daily work.
* Inspire people to get the best out of themselves and out of each other
* Fostering a completely new department, building a true feeling of being a team

Services Management responsibilities
* Maintaining realistic forecasts, ensuring maximized target adherence
* Point of contact for multiple departments within organization regarding resource requests
* Establishing KPI information dashboards and overviews for the team
* Supporting Director in strategic decision making, for example relating to hiring, training needs, market needs, GEO needs, etc.
profile_positions.title: Team Manager - DELMIA WorldWide HUB

profile_positions.description:
Leading teams of Business Consultants within a customer implementation project. Main tasks:
* Responsible for functional deliverables submitted to customers
* Maintaining a functional overview of the solution while helping the team to focus on the details.
* Responsible to maintain the consultant-related project planning, keep overview of tasks and adjust priorities where needed.
* Main point of contact towards the customer from a content-perspective.
* Ensure team members learn and grow, in order to boost team productivity, efficiency, individual growth and fun!
* Continuous alignment with Project Management on potential project/solution risks to be mitigated.
profile_positions.title: Lead Business Consultant - Quintiq

profile_positions.description:
Every business has its planning puzzles, some large, some complex, some seemingly impossible to solve. Quintiq’s vision is to solve any planning puzzle of any size using one planning system to cover every aspect of planning; from long-term strategic plans to short-term schedules and disruption management. Today, approximately 12.000 users in numerous global organizations in over 80 countries use Quintiq on a daily basis. 

In my role as a consultant at Quintiq I am responsible for constructing a vision for the SCP needs of customers. Being the sparring partner for the planning department of the customer for all their planning challenges, a main responsibility is to gather clear customer requirements within the project scope. Defining and executing clear tests of the designed solutions is an essential step in the development process towards a final planning puzzle software package. This process is finished by training customers in the use of their new SCP solutions.
profile_positions.title: Business Consultant - Quintiq

profile_positions.description:
The aim of the traineeship was to acquire extensive knowledge of several departments within the insurance field. I have gained working experience in the departments of Internal Accounts,  Risk Analysis, Health Insurance, Damage Claims and Proxy Management.

Next to this, there was a significant focus on obtaining a 'helicopter view' in order to spot, analyse and solve inefficiencies throughout the entire organization. As a result, I spent roughly 80% of my time on spotting inefficiencies and consequently designing, discussing, internally 'selling' and developing standalone efficiency software tools (using ao. Visual Studio, SQL Server Management).
 
Starting from scratch, this resulted in a highly developed and complete software package containing business logic, automated calculations, Excel report generation and formatting, database connections, XML messaging and Outlook plug-ins. 

Three main business improvements resulted from using the software that I designed and delivered:
• Efficiency:  multiple 30-min manual tasks became 5-min automated tasks, the most significant improvement was in a 16-hour manual task that has become a 2-hour task using the software.
• Accuracy: due to automated calculations, the number of inaccuracies due to manual calculation dropped drastically.
• Consistency: the implemented business logic and automated calculations lead to Mutsaerts now being sure to offer consistent pricing proposals and insurance conditions to like-for-like prospects and customers.
